title: Issue with ping and a TEMP fix.
body:
Hello everyone,

I have managed to fix my ping for now with WTFast.

I do not affiliate with them nor do I have a premium account.

This was done with a free trial.

Also, for those of you who have tried this and it has failed, try again with these following steps;

Download WTFast.

Login as a Basic User.

http://i.gyazo.com/47e50297801c95d5551271da2a4c114a.png

__

How to configure:
__

Under Game, select custom games and click add;

http://i.gyazo.com/57e7fc457eebddcccc64cb8607172095.png
__

Name; LoL

Game executable file(Different for some); 

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.85\deploy\League Of Legends.exe

(YOURS WILL BE IN THE DRIVE YOU INSTALLED LoL ON IF NOT "C:\" )

Click OK.

Run with launcher; 

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.exe

Should look like this; http://i.gyazo.com/e9a2dd75a14d29e82f5e0983f9aed9ff.png
__

Network;

Auto select best route connection.

http://i.gyazo.com/63ac0a28bd5753aa7881e67f190d399d.png
__

Select LoL as the custom game and click play.

http://i.gyazo.com/0ebf60344214fa9ded7948c1a40ca6c6.png
__



Restart your League client and test it on a custom game.

After your game, in WTFast click start new game and start LoL.

http://i.gyazo.com/b699b317da49940f3b48146a85d8c4a2.png

I've gone from an average of 175 ping back to 52 ping.

If you have any issues feel free to message me in game and I'll try my best to help you. {{summoner:13}}

EDIT: Make sure you click play, again, or you will encounter a firewall error!

VPN's don't decrease your ping.

You send packets to the VPN servers, then the VPN sends those same packets to Riot's servers, when you could just send them directly to Riot's servers.

These programs are bloatware which slow down your system with hidden installs, if not virus'

VPN may or may not lower ping.

Let's not bring the anti-WTFast circlejerk to boards pls.
Pretty much any vpn with an NZ server will work if you can't get wtfast to work.
